title: anyone up for a ton of normals? teamspeak and will be playing all night :D
body:
basically as the title suggests.. im playing all night and looking for anyone that wants to join me. 
Its more fun with ppl in teamspeak/vent/etc :D

Im level 30 and have been playing since lol came out years ago. I have 887 normal wins. Dont care what your skill level or acc level is, lets just play :D

reply here ill keep checking it or just add me my name is lixxxx
